H0.text: What is the imperial distance of a marathon race. 25 miles, 200 yards

H1.text: What is the imperial distance of a marathon race. 28 miles, 100 yards

H2.text: What is the imperial distance of a marathon race. 24 miles, 500 yards

H3.text: What is the imperial distance of a marathon race. 26 miles, 385 yards

A4.text: The course was later altered to use a different entrance to the stadium, followed by a partial lap 작은 of 385 yards to the same finish.

A5.text: The organizers decided on a course of 26 miles from the start at Windsor Castle to the royal entrance to the White City Stadium, followed by a lap (586 yards 2 feet; 536 m) of the track, finishing in front of the Royal Box.
